  • Method Details

    • updateStaff

      public void updateStaff(StaffController staffController, String email, Staff updatedStaff)
      Updates the information of a staff member based on their email. If the staff member with the given email exists, their name, faculty, and password (if needed) will be updated. If the staff member does not exist, a message will be printed indicating that the staff member was not found.
      Specified by:
      updateStaff in interface StaffServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      staffController - The StaffController object used to access the staff file handler.
      email - The email of the staff member to be updated.
      updatedStaff - The updated Staff object containing the new information.

    • isFirstLogin

      public boolean isFirstLogin(StaffController staffController, String email)
      Checks if the staff member with the given email is logging in for the first time.
      Specified by:
      isFirstLogin in interface StaffServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      staffController - the StaffController object
      email - the email of the staff member
      Returns:
      true if the staff member is logging in for the first time, false otherwise

    • checkPassword

      public boolean checkPassword(StaffController staffController, String email, String password)
      Checks if the provided password matches the password of the staff member with the given email.
      Specified by:
      checkPassword in interface StaffServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      staffController - the staff controller object
      email - the email of the staff member
      password - the password to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the password matches, false otherwise

    • changePassword

      public void changePassword(StaffController staffController, String email, String newPassword)
      Changes the password of a staff member identified by their email.
      Specified by:
      changePassword in interface StaffServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      staffController - The staff controller object.
      email - The email of the staff member.
      newPassword - The new password to set.

    • getStaffMail

      public String getStaffMail(String id)
      Returns the staff email address based on the provided ID.
      Specified by:
      getStaffMail in interface StaffServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the staff
      Returns:
      the staff email address

    • getStaffFaculty

      public String getStaffFaculty(StaffController staffController, String email)
      Retrieves the faculty of a staff member based on their email.
      Specified by:
      getStaffFaculty in interface StaffServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      staffController - the staff controller object
      email - the email of the staff member
      Returns:
      the faculty of the staff member, or "Staff not found" if the staff member is not found

    • getStaffName

      public String getStaffName(StaffController staffController, String email)
      Retrieves the name of a staff member based on their email.
      Specified by:
      getStaffName in interface StaffServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      staffController - The staff controller object.
      email - The email of the staff member.
      Returns:
      The name of the staff member if found, otherwise "Staff not found".

    • verifyStaff

      public boolean verifyStaff(StaffController staffController, String email)
      Verifies if a staff member with the given email exists in the staff list.
      Specified by:
      verifyStaff in interface StaffServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      staffController - the staff controller object
      email - the email to be verified
      Returns:
      true if a staff member with the given email exists, false otherwise
